dict.string: Oi My AI skills may use automation to control other applications on your behalf.
Oi My AI skills may access your calendar to read and create events.
Oi My AI skills may access your calendar to read and create events.
Oi My AI skills may access your contacts to search and read contact information.
Oi My AI skills may access your reminders to read and create tasks.
Oi My AI skills may access your location to provide location-based services.
Oi My AI skills may access your location to provide location-based services.
Oi My AI uses the microphone for voice transcription with WhisperKit.
Oi My AI can capture system audio for transcription. Screen content is not recorded.
